headline: An 'Encouraged' Wall Street Bullish on Peloton
summary: Truist analysts Monday upgraded Peloton stock to "buy" from "hold" and set a price target of $11, above the average target on Wall Street of $10.20, according to Visible Alpha.

headline: Peloton upgraded at Truist as profitability, growth outlook improves
summary: Investing.com -- Truist Securities upgraded Peloton Interactive (NASDAQ:PTON) to "Buy" from "Hold" given its improving fundamentals, cleaner balance sheet, and a clearer path to sustained profitability under new leadership.
